questions.question: Jesus used parables to teach people. Which of the following is NOT true about parables?

choices.answer: A short story with a massive meaning
A made-up story containing absolutely no truth
A made-up story that communicates spiritual truths
A short story with a main message

questions.question: Why did Jesus use parables to teach people?

choices.answer: To get people's attention - everyone likes stories!
Stories (and the message within them) are easy to remember!
To get people thinking and emotionally-involved!
Those who DON'T reflect on Jesus' words WON'T decode the important message!

questions.question: What do Jesus' parables teach us about?

choices.answer: God's character and kingdom
Human sin and godliness
How we should relate to God and each another
All of the above

questions.question: What is the main message of 'The parable of the tenants'?

choices.answer: Those who reject God and his messengers will eventually face God's justice
Only those who respond rightly to Jesus will receive life in God's kingdom
Jesus knew he would be crucified - this was part of God's plan to save us
If we trust  Jesus, we'll receive forgiveness & help to respond rightly

questions.question: What's the main message of 'The Parable of the Lost Sons'?

choices.answer: Being greedy and selfish is fine - as long as you say sorry!
If we obey God then we should get whatever we pray for
We all wrong God but he loves us & will forgive us if we ask
God does not care about sin or justice

questions.question: What's the main message of 'The Parable of the Unmerciful Servant'?

choices.answer: We should never show mercy to those who are unmerciful
God's mercy to us means we should be merciful to others
We should never ask someone to pay back money we lend them
We should never borrow large amounts of money

questions.question: What's the main message of 'The Parable of the Overpaid Workers'?

choices.answer: Bosses should overpay staff to highlight God's generosity
We should never complain if we are unfairly paid
We should all do jobs that give maximum pay for minimum work
We should celebrate that God is generous in love and mercy

questions.question: What's the main message of 'The Parable of the Sower'?

choices.answer: Farmers should try to grow seeds on paths, rocks and weeds
People respond differently to God's message of forgiveness
Some people are good; some people are bad
If we try hard we will be good enough to please God
